}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Per the FCC docs, this module is using BCM43362KUBG.
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan644.html ''USI WM-N-BM-14'' on '''EmbeddedWorks'''] :[[USI WM-N-BM-14]] - Smart Wi-Fi/IoT Module :Chipset: BCM43362 (Cortex-M3) + STM32F205 :WLAN: 802.11bgn 1x1 (2.4GHz) w/ printed antenna
The following coveredmodels are specified in the test report... *WM-N-BM-11 - with MFI Auth IC *WM-N-BM-14 - without MFI Auth IC *WM-N-BM-14A without MFI Auth IC and with '''Ayla''' logo <!-- ===See also=== *[[USI WM-N-BM-02]] - SiP Module (BCM43362) 802.11bgn 1x1 *[[USI NFA-BAC-MR-02]] - Wireless NGFF Module (M.2 2230) :Chipset: [[Marvell]] 88W8897P 802.11abgn/ac 2x2 + BT 4.0 :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/COFNFABACMR02 COFNFABACMR02] (2014-02-26) *[[USI BWM-N-MR-03]] - Wireless WICED Module 802.11bgn 1x1 :Chipset: [[Marvell]] 88MC200 (@200MHz Cortex-M3) + 88W8801 :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/COFBWMNMR03 COFBWMNMR03] (2016-01-21) *[[USI WM-N-BM-04]] - SiP Module (BCM4330) 802.11bgn 1x1 *[[USI WM-BAN-BM-07 S]] - SiP Module (BCM4334) 802.11abgn 1x1 + BT 4.0 *[[USI WM-N-BM-09]] - Smart Wi-Fi/IoT Module 802.11bgn 1x1 :[[Broadcom]] BCM43362 (Cortex-M3) + STM32F205 *[[USI WM-BAC-AT-09]] - SIP Module (QCA9377) 802.11abgn 1x1 + BT 4.0 *[[USI WM-BAN-BM-10 L]] - SiP Module (BCM43241) 802.11abgn 2x2 + BT 4.0 *[[USI WM-N-BM-11]] - SiP Module (BCM43362) 802.11bgn 1x1 :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/COFWMNBM11 COFWMNBM11] *[[USI WM-BAN-BM-13]] - SiP Module (BCM43341) 802.11abgn 1x1 + BT4.0/FM/NFC *[[USI WM-N-BM-14]] - SiP Module (BCM43362 + STM32F205) 802.11bgn 1x1 • [http://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan644.html EW] *[[USI WM-BAN-BM-16]] - SiP Module (SD) • [http://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan675.html EW] :Chipset: [[Cypress]]/[[Broadcom]] BCM43340 :WLAN: 802.11abgn 1x1 + Bluetooth 4.0 :Dimension: 12mm x 12mm x 1.5mm *[[USI WM-BAN-BM-19]] -
